articles.title: Argentina extends biofuel blend rate to avoid gas import increase
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Aug 24 - The Argentine government on Wednesday extended its 12.5% biodiesel blend rate to avoid fuel import increases, having first increased it in June from 5%.Argentina heavily relies on imports to meet its fuel demand, costing it valuable foreign currency, which is already in low supply and which the government is trying to hold on to amid sky-high inflation
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Aug 24 - The Argentine government on Wednesday extended its 12.5% biodiesel blend rate to avoid fuel import increases, having first increased it in June from 5%.
Argentina heavily relies on imports to meet its fuel demand, costing it va... [738 chars]

articles.title: Billboard Argentina
articles.description: Plus, Paulo Londra and Ed Sheeran score the highest debut with “Noche De Novela.”
articles.content: Bizarrap and Quevedo’s “Bzrp Music Sessions, Vol. 52” scores a sixth week at No. 1 on the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart (dated Aug. 20). It’s the title with the second-most weeks atop the ranking in 2022, after the nine-week reign of “Entre Nosot... [1189 chars]

articles.content:
Argentina coach Michael Cheika has named the following team to play New Zealand in Saturday's Rugby Championship test in Christchurch:

articles.title: Canada hopes for better result in Victoria as it welcomes Argentina in basketball World Cup qualifier
articles.description: Canada’s men’s basketball team is looing to recover from Tokyo Olympics qualifier loss and keep rolling toward qualification for the FIBA 2023 World Cup
articles.content: Canada's Trae Bell-Haynes, centre, drives to the net between Dominican Republic's Gelvis Solano, left, and Rigoberto Mendoza, right, in FIBA international men's World Cup basketball qualifying action, in Hamilton, Ont., on July 1.COLE BURSTON/The Can... [4762 chars]

articles.title: Canada hopes for better result in Victoria as it welcomes Argentina in WCup qualifier
articles.description: VICTORIA — The last time Canada's men's basketball team travelled to Victoria, the trip ended in deep disappointment.
articles.content:
